ThingDef.label: shard sentry
ThingDef.description: An automated deployable turret with an exceptionally high rate of fire. Its poor range and stopping power make it better suited for close quarter security than long-range perimeter defense. It may explodes when destroyed.

ThingDef.label: shard sentry gun
ThingDef.description: A heavy-duty shard cannon designed to be installed on an automated turret.

ThingDef.label: wave emmiter
ThingDef.description: A deployable microwave emitter that disrupts enemy combat effectiveness by inducing a severe burning sensation. It may explode upon destruction.

ThingDef.label: wave emitter
ThingDef.description: A heavy-duty wave emitter designed to be installed on an automated turret.

ThingDef.label: HMG nest
ThingDef.description: A fortified machine gun nest with built-in barricades. Effective at suppressing small groups while offering substantial protection. Must be manned to operate.

ThingDef.label: heavy machine gun
ThingDef.description: A large-caliber belt-fed machine gun

ThingDef.label: grenade nest
ThingDef.description: A fortified automatic grenade launcher nest with protective barricades. Highly effective against slow-moving or clustered enemies, while offering cover to those behind it. Must be manned to operate.

ThingDef.label: automatic grenade launcher
ThingDef.description: A belt-fed automatic grenade launcher that fires explosive projectiles.

ThingDef.label: recoilless rifle nest
ThingDef.description: A fortified recoilless rifle nest with protective barricades. Highly effective against a heavily armored target, while offering cover to those behind it. Must be manned to operate.

ThingDef.label: recoilless rifle
ThingDef.description: A recoilless rifle designed to launch high-explosive shells at fortified targets.

ThingDef.label: deployable machine gun
ThingDef.description: A deployable machine gun with decent firepower and a solid rate of fire. It can be repositioned as the battle demands, but must be operated manually.

ThingDef.label: machine gun
ThingDef.description: A belt-fed machine gun chambered for medium-caliber cartridges.

ThingDef.label: deployable AMR
ThingDef.description: A deployable anti-materiel sniper rifle. Slow to fire, but offers long range and high firepower. It can be repositioned as the battle demands, but must be operated manually.

ThingDef.label: anti-materiel rifle
ThingDef.description: A large-caliber sniper rifle mounted on a tripod.

ThingDef.label: deployable light mortar
ThingDef.description: A lightweight, re-deployable mortar. It has a shorter range and lower firepower than standard models, but does not require traditional mortar shells. Like other mortars, it must be manually operated.

ThingDef.label: light mortar
ThingDef.description: A light infantry support mortar.

ThingDef.label: portable reactor
ThingDef.description: A small, portable field reactor that produces power by consuming uranium. It is useful when you need a power source that can be deployed quickly. Explodes when destroyed.

ThingDef.label: kinetic sniper Turret
ThingDef.description: an automated turret armed with a long-range, precision kinetic cannon. While offering excellent range and accuracy, its low durability makes it vulnerable and easily destroyed once engaged. Destruction can result in a Kinetic Impact explosion.

ThingDef.label: kinetic cannon
ThingDef.description: A precision long-ranged kinetic cannon designed to be installed on an automated turret.

ThingDef.label: suppressor turret
ThingDef.description: an automated turret armed with a singularity projector that unleashes powerful area-of-effect attacks, drastically slowing any enemies caught in its field. Destroying the turret may sets off a kinetic-impact explosion.

ThingDef.label: singularity projector
ThingDef.description: A kinetic cannon designed to be installed on an automated turret.

ThingDef.label: singularity mine
ThingDef.description: Advanced mine with a motion tracker. This mine explodes immediately when an enemy is detected. When it explodes, it slows down the ones around it.

ThingDef.label: fuel barrel
ThingDef.description: An iconic red barrel, packed with highly volatile chemfuel. One good shot is all it takes to make them blow.

ThingDef.label: decoy dummy
ThingDef.description: A crude but effective decoy: a dummy made in worn clothes and wielding a fake rifle. Its purpose is simpleâ€”distract the enemy and buy your colonists some time.

ThingDef.label: fake rifle
ThingDef.description: A fake rifle.

ThingDef.label: ULM cannon
ThingDef.description: Forged from hatred of heavily armored mechanoids and fueled by rage against their clusters, this long-range automated turret fires large-caliber explosive liquid-metal shells. Its slow rate of fire is offset by its exceptional range and devastating explosive power. Note that the turret is incapable of engaging close-range targets and is prone to explode upon destruction.

ThingDef.label: ULM cannon
ThingDef.description: a large-caliber turret-mounted gun, fires explosive liquid metal shells

ThingDef.label: barrage turret
ThingDef.description: A heavily armored automatic turret that unleashes multiple explosive molten metal projectiles simultaneously. While its range is short and rate of fire slow, it compensates with devastating firepower that can strike a wide area at once. If destroyed, it may detonate in a violent explosion. And of course, watch out for friendly fire.

ThingDef.label: barrage cannon
ThingDef.description: A turret-mounted heavy, multi-barreled ULM cannon.

ThingDef.label: smart mine
ThingDef.description: A semi-intelligent mine that shoots high-explosive projectile to a nearby target. The danger range is much wider than that of ordinary landmines. Can be rearmed with HE shell. Because it is widely known how dangerous this little thing is, enemies will try to destroy it as soon as they see it. Doesn't explode when destroyed.

ThingDef.label: projectile launcher
ThingDef.description: A short-ranged HE projectile launcher.

ThingDef.label: cannon
ThingDef.description: A cannon that fires shells in a direct line of fire. It requires manual operation by a crew. While capable of devastating firepower, it has a limited range compared to mortars. However, it is more accurate and faster-firing than a mortar.

li.outOfFuelMessage: Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel

ThingDef.label: cannon
ThingDef.description: A cannon. Fires bombs directly. The range is limited but more accurate than a mortar and fires faster.

ThingDef.label: EMP lobber turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic grenade launcher that disrupts electronic devices with EMP blasts. Requires resupply once its ammo runs out. If damaged, it may trigger a pulse explosion. Be cautious of friendly fire.

ThingDef.label: EMP lobber
ThingDef.description: A simple EMP grenade launcher made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: incendiary lobber turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic grenade launcher that unleashes incendiary grenades. Requires resupply once its ammo runs out. If damaged, it may erupt in a fiery explosion. Beware of friendly fire and spreading flamesâ€”chaos can escalate in seconds. Stay alert. You have been warned.

ThingDef.label: incendiary lobber
ThingDef.description: A simple incendiary grenade launcher made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: incinerator turret
ThingDef.description: A heavy automated flamethrower turret that projects a stream of fire across an area. It can arc flames over allies without harming them, but its fuel tanks require refueling after use. The fire dissipates quickly, igniting only the most flammable targets. Cannot engage enemies at point-blank rangeâ€”and, of course, will explode if damaged. Place and operate with extreme caution. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

ThingDef.label: incinerator turret
ThingDef.description: A heavy flamethrower designed to attach to a turret.

ThingDef.label: graser turret
ThingDef.description: A power-hungry heavy gamma-ray laser turret that unleashes a sweeping beam of concentrated energy. Its narrow, high-intensity ray can pierce even the thickest armor and ignite anything it touches. However, it cannot target enemies at point-blank rangeâ€”and if destroyed, it may detonate in a violent explosion.

ThingDef.label: graser turret
ThingDef.description: A heavy beam graser designed to attach to a turret.

ThingDef.label: rotary gun turret
ThingDef.description: A heavy turret features an electrically-driven rotary gun that unleash standard-caliber rounds at a blistering rate, creating a lethal curtain of fire. While devastating against massed enemies, the intense firing rate causes rapid barrel degradation, requiring frequent replacement. Unable to engage close-range targets, the turret is also prone to explosion when damaged.

ThingDef.label: rotary gun turret
ThingDef.description: A heavy rotary gun designed to attach to a turret.

ThingDef.label: Agar Union Repeating Gun
ThingDef.description: Caliber: .58 Caliber Ball. 15-round bullet hopper. Crank-Action.

ThingDef.label: Agar Union Repeating Gun
ThingDef.description: Caliber: .58 Caliber Ball. 15-round bullet hopper. Crank-Action.

ThingDef.label: Billinghurst Requa Battery Gun
ThingDef.description: Caliber: .58 Caliber Ball. 25x 1-round tubes. Single-Shot.

ThingDef.label: Billinghurst Requa Battery Gun
ThingDef.description: Caliber: .58 Caliber Ball. 25x 1-round tubes. Single-Shot.

ThingDef.label: Gatling Gun M1862
ThingDef.description: Caliber: .58 Caliber Ball. 15-round bullet hopper. Crank-Action.

ThingDef.label: Gatling Gun M1862
ThingDef.description: Caliber: .58 Caliber Ball. 15-round bullet hopper. Crank-Action.

ThingDef.label: Gatling Gun M1865
ThingDef.description: Caliber: .50-70 Gov't. 15-round bullet hopper. Crank-Action.

ThingDef.label: Gatling Gun M1865
ThingDef.description: Caliber: .50-70 Gov't. 15-round bullet hopper. Crank-Action.

ThingDef.label: UAG-40
ThingDef.description: The UAG-40 is an ukrainian automatic grenade launcher. It is manufactured by the armament company Leninska Kuznya.

ThingDef.label: UAG-40
ThingDef.description: The UAG-40 is an ukrainian automatic grenade launcher. It is manufactured by the armament company Leninska Kuznya.

ThingDef.label: RN CQB desk
ThingDef.description: A workbench for manufacturing Rimmu-Nation short barreled weapons such as handguns, PDWs and shotguns.

ThingDef.label: RN LBW desk
ThingDef.description: A workbench for manufacturing Rimmu-Nation long barreled weapons such as automatic rifles, bolt action and marksman rifles.

ThingDef.label: RN HW desk
ThingDef.description: A workbench for manufacturing Rimmu-Nation heavy weapons such as GPMG, explosives and spacer weaponry.

ThingDef.label: RIM-116 RAM
ThingDef.description: An AI-operated surface-to-air missile launcher. Can fire at mortar shells and drop pods, and does not require a line of sight. Not designed to fire at ground-level targets. Requires a power source to operate.

ThingDef.description: RIM-116 RAM.
